title: The Deer Hunter
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

title: Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

title: Dawn of the Dead
description: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

title: Days of Heaven
description: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

title: Superman
description: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

title: Grease
description: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

title: National Lampoon's Animal House
description: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

title: Coming Home
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A woman whose husband is fighting in Vietnam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.

title: Autumn Sonata
description: A celebrated classical pianist visits her neglected daughter in Sweden, where old wounds resurface.

title: The Last Waltz
description: A documentary about the 1976 farewell concert of The Band, featuring performances by their friends and influences.

title: Watership Down
description: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

title: An Unmarried Woman
description: A wealthy woman re-evaluates her life when her husband leaves her for a younger woman.

title: Blue Collar
description: Three auto workers, fed up with their union leadership and their working conditions, plan to rob the union safe.

title: The Tree of Wooden Clogs
description: The life of four peasant families living in a farm in Lombardy, Italy, at the end of the 19th century.

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, replicating the residents one body at a time.

title: Midnight Express
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

title: Get Out Your Handkerchiefs
description: A man's wife is depressed, so he finds her a lover in the hopes of cheering her up.

title: The Silent Partner
description: A timid bank teller anticipates a bank robbery and steals the money himself before the robber arrives. The sadist robber realizes he's been tricked and tracks down the teller.

title: Big Wednesday
description: The lives of three friends who are united by their love for surfing, spanning from the 1960s to the 1970s.

title: The Driver
description: A specialist driver for getaway cars finds himself pursued by a detective obsessed with catching him.

title: Straight Time
description: A career criminal is released on parole but finds it impossible to go straight, leading him back to a life of crime.

title: Girlfriends
description: A young photographer deals with loneliness and her career after her roommate and best friend moves out to get married.

title: The Chant of Jimmie Blacksmith
description: A half-white, half-Aboriginal man in turn-of-the-century Australia is driven to madness by racism and mistreatment.

title: Newsfront
description: The story of newsreel cameramen in Australia from the late 1940s to the 1950s.

title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
description: A man learns martial arts at the Shaolin temple to fight against the oppressive Manchu government.

title: Drunken Master
description: A mischievous young man is trained in martial arts by his drunken master to defeat an assassin.

title: Snake in the Eagle's Shadow
description: An orphan who is bullied at a kung fu school is taught a unique fighting style by a beggar.

title: Five Deadly Venoms
description: A dying master sends his last student to check up on five former pupils, who each know a special style of kung fu, to see if they are using their skills for good or evil.

title: Heroes of the East
description: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and he manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her.

title: Crippled Avengers
description: After a group of martial artists are crippled by a ruthless warlord, they learn kung fu to take their revenge.

title: Warriors Two
description: A man learns Wing Chun to defeat a gang of thugs who are trying to take over his town.

title: The Avenging Eagle
description: A renegade killer from a criminal clan teams up with a stranger to defeat the clan's leader.

title: Killer of Sheep
description: A slaughterhouse worker struggles to survive in the Watts neighborhood of Los Angeles.

title: Gates of Heaven
description: A documentary about the pet cemetery business, and the people who get involved in it.

title: The Whole Shootin' Match
description: Two friends in Texas struggle to get rich quick with a series of failed schemes.

title: Northern Lights
description: A dramatization of the early days of the Nonpartisan League in North Dakota.

title: Perceval le Gallois
description: A stylized adaptation of Chrétien de Troyes' Arthurian romance about a naive youth who becomes a knight.

title: Molière
production_studio: Les Films du Soleil et de la Nuit
description: A biopic of the French playwright Molière.

title: Dossier 51
description: A secret service agency compiles a dossier on a diplomat in order to find a way to manipulate him.

title: Orchestra Rehearsal
description: An Italian television crew films an orchestra rehearsal in a 13th-century church, which descends into chaos.

title: Max Havelaar
description: A Dutch colonial administrator in the East Indies tries to reform the corrupt system but faces opposition from his superiors and local rulers.

title: The Rutles: All You Need Is Cash
description: A mockumentary that follows the career of a Beatles-like band called The Rutles.

title: The Medusa Touch
description: A French detective in London investigates a series of disasters that seem to be caused by a man with telekinetic powers.

title: The Buddy Holly Story
description: The life history of rock and roll singer Buddy Holly.

title: Death on the Nile
description: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board.

title: The Boys from Brazil
description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister plot to revive the Third Reich using cloning.

title: Stevie
description: A biopic of the British poet Stevie Smith.

title: In a Year of 13 Moons
description: A transsexual woman struggles with identity and rejection in late 1970s Germany.

title: Without Anesthesia
description: A well-known foreign correspondent finds his personal and professional life crumbling when his wife leaves him and he falls out of favor with the regime.

title: La Cage aux Folles
description: Two gay men living in St. Tropez have their lives turned upside down when the son of one of the men announces he is getting married to a girl whose father is a right-wing politician.

title: Heaven Can Wait
description: A football player is taken to heaven prematurely, and must be returned to Earth in the body of a millionaire who has just been murdered by his wife and accountant.

title: Interiors
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden and unexpected divorce.

title: Up in Smoke
description: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.
